label_config:
<View>
  <Style>
    .col { display: flex; flex-direction: column; padding: 8px; }
    .row { display: flex; flex-direction: row; }
  </Style>
  <View className="row">
    <View className="col" style="flex:2;">
      <Header value="Symptoms (Text)"/>
      <Text name="symptoms" value="$notes"/>
      <Choices name="symptom_labels" toName="symptoms" choice="multiple">
        <Choice value="Dyspnea"/>
        <Choice value="Chest pain"/>
        <Choice value="Cough"/>
        <Choice value="Fever"/>
        <Choice value="Other"/>
      </Choices>
    </View>
    <View className="col" style="flex:2;">
      <Header value="Chest X-ray"/>
      <Image name="cxr" value="$imaging_url" zoom="true"/>
      <Choices name="cxr_findings" toName="cxr" choice="multiple">
        <Choice value="Normal"/>
        <Choice value="Consolidation"/>
        <Choice value="Effusion"/>
        <Choice value="Edema"/>
        <Choice value="Other"/>
      </Choices>
    </View>
  </View>
  <View className="row">
    <View className="col" style="flex:2;">
      <Header value="Vitals Time-series"/>
      <TimeSeries name="vitals" value="$vitals_ts" valueType="url"/>
      <Choices name="vitals_assessment" toName="vitals" choice="single">
        <Choice value="Stable"/>
        <Choice value="Borderline"/>
        <Choice value="Unstable"/>
      </Choices>
    </View>
    <View className="col" style="flex:2;">
      <Header value="Labs (Table)"/>
      <Table name="labs" value="$labs_table"/>
      <Choices name="labs_assessment" toName="labs" choice="single">
        <Choice value="Normal"/>
        <Choice value="Mildly abnormal"/>
        <Choice value="Severely abnormal"/>
      </Choices>
    </View>
  </View>
  <View className="row">
    <View className="col" style="flex:1;">
      <Header value="Overall Diagnosis / Label"/>
      <TextArea name="overall_comment" toName="symptoms" rows="4" placeholder="Summarize key findings and diagnosis..."/>
    </View>
  </View>
</View>
